net.proteusframework.data.filesystem

Interface FileSystemEntityDataSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyFileSystemEntityDataSource, FileSystemEntityDataSourceImpl, ZipFileListDataSource

    public interface FileSystemEntityDataSource
extends DataSource
    DataSource for file system entities.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getFile()
      Return the file that represents this datasource.
      long getLastModifiedTime()
      Get the last modified time of the data.
      long getLength()
      Get the length of the data.
      Map<String,Serializable> getMetaData()
      Get the meta data associated with the data.
      boolean isBackedByInputStream()
      Return true if the data source is backed by an input stream.

      • Methods inherited from interface javax.activation.DataSource

        getContentType, getInputStream, getName, getOutputStream

    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        @Nullable
File getFile()
        Return the file that represents this datasource. This may return null if the FileSystemEntityDataSource is not backed by a file.
        Returns:
        the file or null.

      • getLastModifiedTime

        long getLastModifiedTime()
        Get the last modified time of the data.
        Returns:
        the last modified time or -1 if unknown.

      • getLength

        long getLength()
        Get the length of the data.
        Returns:
        the length or -1 if unknown.

      • getMetaData

        Map<String,Serializable> getMetaData()
        Get the meta data associated with the data.
        Returns:
        the meta data.

      • isBackedByInputStream

        boolean isBackedByInputStream()
        Return true if the data source is backed by an input stream. If this method returns false, getFile() must return a non-null value.
        Returns:
        true or false.
